page_description: National and international olympiads, competitions, and contests for students and teachers. Information about stages, registration, past tasks, and results.

teacher_of_year.title: Teacher of the Year - 2025
teacher_of_year.subtitle: National competition of pedagogical excellence for teachers and educators

about.title: About the Competition
about.description: The National "Teacher of the Year" competition is a prestigious annual contest for educators aimed at identifying, supporting, and promoting best practices in education. The competition has been held since 1992 and is an important platform for professional growth of teachers.

stage_1.title: Stage I - School
stage_1.description: Competition held in educational institutions. Winners from each school advance to the next stage.

stage_2.title: Stage II - District/City
stage_2.description: Competition among school stage winners at the district or city level.

stage_3.title: Stage III - Regional
stage_3.description: Regional stage of the competition. Winners represent the region at the national stage.

stage_4.title: Stage IV - National
stage_4.description: Final stage of the competition with determination of winners in each nomination.

requirements.title: Participant Requirements
list: Pedagogical work experience of at least 3 years
